project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program to read a text file, count the frequency of each word, and display the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Read text file and extract words
Identify the top 10 most common words
Display the top 10 most common words in the terminal
Write tests for the functions implemented above
Execute tests to ensure correctness of implemented features
